profile.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.7.11 XMP Package - PDF/A Identification Schema.
profile.description: The PDF/A Identification Schema has required prefix "pdfaid".
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: The PDF/A Identification Schema has required prefix "pdfaid".

error.message: A PDF/A Identification Schema namespace prefix is %1, but shall be "pdfaid".
